wikitext.*:
'''Michael Green''' is an American artist. In the late 1970s, his illustrations inspired by ''The Lord of the Rings'' were published in ''[[The Tolkien Scrapbook]]'', ''[[A Hobbit's Travels]]'', ''[[A Hobbit's Journal]]'' and ''[[A Walk Through the Shire]]'', all published by the Running Press Book Publishers.
